name: ROCKET HAMMER DEATH ROLL FUCKING SAWBLADE
name_original: ROCKET HAMMER DEATH ROLL FUCKING SAWBLADE
description:
You "control" a guy with a ROCKET POWERED HAMMER. The CIA is jealous of your HAMMER so they have sent OPERATIVES to shoot you in the FACE. Your goal is to SMASH as many of them as humanly possible in the last 120 SECONDS of your SHORT but BEAUTIFUL life.

Controls (also found in-game):

Cursor - Control movement

Left click - Boost hammer

Mouse wheel up - Buy sawblade

Mouse wheel down - Buy explosive

X - Fun

Allegedly made by psychicweaver for KO game jam 2023, with feedback and audio design from Janooba.
